name: Grappling Hook Prototype
description:
Just a fun little toy where some enemies (let's call them prison guards) chase you and you'll have to escape by finding 2 green power cells, then get to the exit marked in blue.

There's no win state or lose state, really, since I didn't find it particularly challenging enough to be a game, but it was kinda fun to grapple around the place, the guards chasing after you! Feels kinda like a dream, a power fantasy.
